info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 1:45PM CDT until April 11 at 2:12PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL KANE...DUPAGE AND NORTHERN COOK COUNTIES... At 144 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hoffman Estates to near Darien, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Aurora, Naperville, Cicero, Schaumburg, Bolingbrook, Des Plaines, Oak Lawn, Berwyn, Wheaton, Oak Park, Downers Grove, Elmhurst, Lombard, Bartlett, Ohare Airport, Carol Stream, Hanover Park, Park Ridge and Addison. This includes... Brookfield Zoo, Lincoln Park Zoo, Loyola University, SeatGeek Stadium, Triton College, University of Chicago, Benedictine University, College of DuPage, DuPage County Fairgrounds, Fermilab, Hawthorne Park, Kane County Cougars Ballpark, Morton Arboretum, Northeastern Illinois University, Soldier Field, University of Illinois Chicago, Guaranteed Rate Field...IL Institute of Technology, Wheaton College, Wrigley Field, The Loop, Museum of Science and Industry, Museum Campus, Northerly Island, and North Central College. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 272 and 294. I-88 between mile markers 122 and 140. I-90 between mile markers 77 and 105. I-94 between mile markers 41 and 62. I-290 between mile markers 5 and 29. I-294 between mile markers 41 and 62. I-355 between mile markers 14 and 30. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
